summary: Unlike its long-winded name, this modification rather simply removes the enchantment charges for those Daedric artifacts which have them.
descriptionHtml:
Added a more lore-friendly, optional file. Read below for changes.


Daedric artifacts are items of legendary power given to champions and the favoured of Daedric princes. In Skyrim, there a number of these items which have exceedingly powerful enchantments on them, but those enchantments run out after so many uses.

This irritating fact is an issue no longer.

Items effected are:

-Volendrung
-Mace of Molag Bal
-the Wabbajack
-Dawnbreaker
-the Skull of Corruption
-Sanguine's Rose (Changes removed in lore-friendly version)

Permissions:
If you feel the need to upload this to another site, feel free to do so, only notify me first and remember to give credit.

Changelog:

8/10/2014
-Added lore-friendly version
author: GreatSilentOne
